name: The Cat Who Did Not Want to Take a Bath
name_original: The Cat Who Did Not Want to Take a Bath
description:
Bath time has come again. Its your job as the house cat to make trouble for your human and hide until they give up. Munch on fish to raise your score.

The Cat Who Did Not Want to Take a Bath was developed as a project for Columbia College's Indie Sprint, a 10 day challenge to develop a game to the best of your ability with a small team.

Features:

  • Collect Fish for points
  • Hide from Human
  • Be a cat

Created by:

Ashlee James - Programmer and Designer

Ali Krouse - Environment Artist and Designer

Zach Rubenstein - Character Artist and Designer

Instructions:

Simply download CatBath.zip and extract the file. Click the CatBath application file to play.
